blogPost.excerpt: genei is an AI-powered productivity tool that now enables users to automatically summarise webpages or PDFs as they browse.
blogPost.body: genei is an AI-powered productivity tool that now enables users to automatically summarise webpages or PDFs as they browse.
blogPost.title: genei chrome extension - AI-generated summaries of webpages and PDFs as you browse 🚀
blogPost.author: Alex Coonar

localize.description: genei是一款由人工智能驱动的生产力工具，现在用户可以在浏览网页或PDF时自动进行总结。
localize.tagline: 当您浏览🚀时，AI生成网页和PDF的摘要。

localize.description: genei是一款由人工智能驅動的生產力工具，現在用戶可以在瀏覽網頁或PDF時自動進行總結。
localize.tagline: 當您瀏覽🚀時，AI生成網頁和PDF的摘要。

previous.excerpt: Create simple shareable polls in seconds. Share your polls across all of your channels - newsletter, group text, Twitter, etc. No sign up required.
previous.title: minipoll - Create simple shareable polls in seconds

localize.description: 在几秒钟内创建简单的可分享投票。在您的所有渠道上分享您的民意调查--通讯、群组文本、Twitter等。无需注册。

localize.description: 在幾秒鐘內創建簡單的可分享投票。在您的所有渠道上分享您的民意調查--通訊、羣組文本、Twitter等。無需註冊。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建簡單的可分享投票

next.excerpt: Collect your avatar from different parts. The code of this program is very easy, any developer will be able to understand the code. SVG is used to draw an avatar. Demo version of the project: https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
next.title: Avatar Maker - Create your own avatar

localize.description: 从不同的地方收集你的头像。本程序的代码非常简单，任何开发人员都能理解。SVG是用来绘制头像的。项目演示版：https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
從不同的地方收集你的頭像。本程序的代碼非常簡單，任何開發人員都能理解。SVG是用來繪製頭像的。項目演示版：https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
